channel.title: 🏢 University of Utah on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Utah on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: On the Robustness of Spectral Algorithms for Semirandom Stochastic Block Models
item.description: Spectral algorithms for graph bisection show surprising robustness to helpful adversaries in semirandom models, with unnormalized Laplacian consistently outperforming the normalized one.
